reviewText: its probably a good tape...but i don't have a tape player and i cant geet nobody to put it into a dvd...so really right now its just collecting dust...so its not the sellers fault
Although it's an old video works good as an old video tape can be expected to. Very pleased.

I love this movie! In fact I'm IN this movie..for a few seconds. I would love the DVD please let me know if anyone ever has a DVD of this wonderful waltz down memory lane. I can remember what i was doing during each of the games they highlight on this marvelous film.

VHS Tape was very clear. Watching the video really brought back memories. 1985 was during the time when baseball was really exciting! Hit & run, stolen bases, sacrifices, squeeze play, etc... The era of Whitey Ball!
My husband watched this as a kid and loved it. He was thrilled to see it again and watches it repeatedly. We got great customer service as well.
